bibl.title: Essays in Honor of C. Bradford Welles.
bibl.seg: Essays in Honor of C. Bradford Welles. (American Studies in Papyrology. 1.)
New Haven, Conn., American Society of Papyrologists, 1966, 4°, xxii-250 pp., 1 portrait, 3 figg. et 6 pll.

C.R. par Ewa Wipszycka, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 313-318. - Fritz Uebel, BibO 28 (1971) pp. 331-338. - Augusto Traversa, Paideia 22 (1967) pp. 394-395. - Marie-Thérèse Lenger, ChrEg 42 (1967) No. 84, pp. 430-436.
